attributes.title: Yet Another Disappointed Customer
attributes.review: As a rootin tootin girl from the south, I was BEYOND excited when I found this app! My friends and family all downloaded it! Thatâ€™s where we went wrong- This app was in NO WAY helpful. It made my phone shut down and crash anytime I opened it. I hate to say it, but maybe if my role model donny gave more attention towards making this app as successful as his golf courses and business rather than the â€œzoomersâ€ (not funny.) on tik tok this would get a 5 star review!

attributes.title: Noâ¤ï¸
attributes.review:
I firstly download this app to show my support to the amazing bunker boyğŸ˜³oops i meant president. Anyways after 365 days of trying to download the app it finally did and may i add that i always have VERY good internet and the app itself was the problem. Once i opened the app an old, saggy, crusty, musty, dusty, absolutely revolting and disgusting orange ğŸŠ appeared on my screen. I spent months crying and wondering what i did to deserve that. Once i took hold of myself i looked at the phone once again and suddenly my eyes started burning and everything was orange. I threw my phone to the side and the WORST THING HAPPENED... the orange CAME OUT OF THE SCREEN i was absolutely mortified. He then started walking ğŸš¶‍â™€ï¸ towards me covered in trump merch screaming at the top of his lungs TRUMP 2020!!!! As i was about to slap him he hid in the bunker with all the lights off...i immediately went to delete the app but it had left a virus ğŸ¦  on my phoneğŸ˜ªi threw the phone away and went to buy a new one while i was setting it up the oompa loompa came out of the bunker ğŸ˜”AND BROKE MY NEW PHONE BECAUSE IT DIDNT HAVE THE TRUMP APPğŸ˜¡ğŸ¤¬ğŸ˜ i was so sad ğŸ˜ but then willy wonka came out of the closet and told his oompa loompa to stop and get back to work. He gave me a new phone ğŸ“± and apologized for the orange giving me a bad time he also offered me free candy for the rest of my life. I accepted and had a little â€œchatâ€ with bunker boy i proceeded to kick and punch him while willy was holding my hoops (thx willy). So yes that was basically my experience with the app so i suggest yaâ€™ll dont get it because the same thing will happen to you. Girl honestly to this day i still get nightmares. I lost the best years of my life to this appğŸ˜­so i DEFINITELY think the app should be deleted immediately.
